quotes.quote: Mathematics is the science of numbers.
quotes.author: Aryabhatta

quotes.quote: Place value gives numbers their power.
quotes.author: Aryabhatta

quotes.quote: Numbers are infinite, reality is mathematical.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Numbers rules the universe.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: The laws of nature are written in the language of mathematics.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: An equation has no meaning unleass it expresses a thought of God.
quotes.author: Srinivasa Ramanujan

quotes.quote: My results were inspired by intuition.
quotes.author: Srinivasa Ramanujan

quotes.quote: God speakes to me through mathematics.
quotes.author: Srinivasa Ramanujan

quotes.quote: Mathematics is not a game, it is a revelation.
quotes.author: Srinivasa Ramanujan

quotes.quote: Zero is the foundation of all computation.
quotes.author: Brahmagupta

quotes.quote: A debt minus zero is a debt.
quotes.author: Brahmagupta

quotes.quote: Positive and negative quantities cancel each other out.
quotes.author: Brahmagupta

quotes.quote: Calculation is the language of reason
quotes.author: Bhaskara II

quotes.quote: Mathematics requires a small dose, not too much.
quotes.author: Issac Newton

quotes.quote: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.
quotes.author: Issac Newton

quotes.quote: Nature does nothing in vain.
quotes.author: Gotfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quotes.quote: The present is pregnant with the future.
quotes.author: Gotfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the alphabet with which God has written the universe.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Measure what can be measured.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the queen of the sciences
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: God does arithemtic.
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: Logic sometimes makes monsters.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to geometry.
quotes.author: Euclid

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the art of reasoning correctly.
quotes.author: George Boole

quotes.quote: Symbols are the secret of clarity
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Without numbers, there is no knowledge.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Mathematics not about numbers, but about understanding.
quotes.author: William Paul Thurston

quotes.quote: The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.
quotes.author: Paul Halmos

quotes.quote: Infinity is not a number, but a concept.
quotes.author: Georg Cantor

quotes.quote: Geometry is frozen music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schelling

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the music of reason.
quotes.author: James Joseph Sylvester

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the language of patterns.
quotes.author: Keith Devlin

quotes.quote: In mathematics, the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
quotes.author: Georg Cantor
